              </a>

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-689957">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/june-2015-national-geographic-traveler-photo-contest/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" alt="June 2015 National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" alt="June 2015 National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-690617">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/a-suspended-bonsai-inside-an-abandoned-power-plant/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">

              </a>

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-694046">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/aaron-onassis/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/onassis-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/onassis-1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-motion loop-video " id="post-674266">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-motion" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/30/sport-photography-by-adam-pretty/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/AdamPretty1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/AdamPretty1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology " id="post-669351">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/20/conceptual-poster-design/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Conceptual-Poster-Design-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Conceptual-Poster-Design-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

             </article>

            </li>

      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </li>

                </picture>
                <div class="container-icon-video">

               <div class="container-text-loop">

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/google-logo-turned-into-functional-search-bar-2/">

                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-13T12:25:17+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 19 heures
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">

                  <img alt="Google Logo Turned into Functional Search Bar" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/searchbar-11-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-527111">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/04/13/best-of-creative-chairs-on-fubiz/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                   Batman in Wood
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-11T15:45:12+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 3 jours
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">
                    
                   </span>
                  </span>
                  <span class="number-share">
                   <span class="icon-share">
                   </span>
                   76
                  </span>
                 </small>
                </div>
               </div>
              </article>
              <!-- .post -->
             </li>

               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">
                   Technology
                  </a>

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
         <h1 class="title-part white-title">
          Tree Landscapes
         </h1>
         <div class="info-article">
          <div class="container-info-article">
           <p class="post-categories">
            <a class="waves-effect" href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/photography/" style="background-color: rgba(204,102,153, 0.85); border-color: rgb(204,102,153);">
             Photography
            </a>
           </p>
           <span class="time">
            <time datetime="2013-03-26T17:14:32+02:00" pubdate="">
             Il y a 2 ans
            </time>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

          <div class="content-single color-photography">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-318187">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               Dcouverte du talent de
               <a href="http://web.ticino.com/fotografie.pierre/Ticino.Svizzera/Pierre_Pellegrini.html">
                Pierre Pelligrini
               </a>
               , un photographe suisse qui dlivre des clichs en noir et blanc absolument magnifiques autour dune srie Tree Landscapes. Voici une slection de diffrentes images splendides prises sous la brume et la neige des arbres  dcouvrir dans la suite.
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/26/tree-landscapes/">

                <script type="text/javascript">
                 jQuery(document).ready(function(e) {
                        
var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-300x600" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                        jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-side-1-old');
                    });
                </script>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </li>

         <div class="content-bloc-advert" id="div-gpt-ad-inc-2">
          <script type="text/javascript">
           var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-970x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                    jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-inc-2-old');
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="most-popular-cat" style="background-image:url(http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Tree-Landscapes7.jpg);">
     <div class="container smxs-full-container">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12">

               <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-693131">
                <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/friendship-between-owlet-and-kitten/">
                 <picture class="img-responsive first">

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-639032">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/04/27/abstract-paper-collages-portraits-by-charles-scott-wilkin/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" media="(min-width:1380px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wilkin-0-440x285.jpg">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wilkin-0-320x207.jpg">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" media="(max-width:1020px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wilkin-0-344x222.jpg">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wilkin-0-440x285.jpg" alt="Abstract Paper Collages Portraits by Charles Scott Wilkin"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

               <div>
                <span class="post-categories">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/design/" style="color:rgb(229,203,82);">
                  Design
                 </a>
                </span>
                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/01/20/intelligent-bang-olufsen-music-system/">
                  Intelligent Bang &amp; Olufsen Music System
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <small class="post-info">
                 <span class="post-about">
                  <time datetime="2015-01-20T14:00:46+02:00" pubdate="">
                   Il y a 6 mois
                  </time>

                </noscript>
               </picture>
               <div class="hover-img">
                <picture class="img-responsive ">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px) and (min-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="240x155" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-240x155.jpg" media="(max-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-440x285.jpg" alt="Look Like Wet Photography"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-440x285.jpg" alt="Look Like Wet Photography"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if !IE]&gt;&lt;!-->
                 <img alt="Look Like Wet Photography" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>
                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->

                  <img alt="Look Like Wet Photography" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Look-Like-Wet-Photography_1-440x285.jpg"/>

                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>

    <script>
     fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
    </script>

  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
